description: Expected results for metadata delta flow test

expected_messages.description: Start message with MetadataDelta mode should be sent successfully
End message should be sent successfully and receive Status_Ok after metadata update

validation_rules.session_consistency: Both messages should use the same session ID
validation_rules.message_order: Messages should be sent in order: start -> end (no data messages)
validation_rules.response_format: Start should receive StartAck, End should receive EndAck with Status_Ok
validation_rules.no_data_messages: MetadataDelta mode should not send any data messages between start and end
validation_rules.indexer_updates: Manager should update agent metadata across all specified indices
